participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, loves music and family.
participant_1.background: I am married with two kids. I eat a raw diet. I see the Rolling Stones in concert every year. I just bought a house recently.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Caring and community-oriented, with a passion for animals and charity.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is navy blue. I work full-time in a shipyard. I donate a part of my salary to charity each month. I volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue.

content.text: hello, how are you? I just got back from the house. what are your hobbies?
I want to talk with girls
oh, I see. I am a house diet. what do you do?
I see. do you have any hobbies? I like to eat raw diet
oh, that is cool. do you like rolling stones? I do. I like it
